mapper.update: update workflow_event_history set graph_id = #{graphId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where event_id = #{eventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select event_id, graph_id, node_id, begin_date, end_date, operator from workflow_event_history
